title: Tuna Pancakes with Zambos Chile Limón
ingredients: ½ cup of Zambos Chile Limón crushed
2 cans of tuna, drained (can be in oil or water)
instructions: Step 1: In a bowl, beat the eggs with the salt and pepper with a fork or whisk.
Step 2: In another container, mash the potatoes well, adding the salt, pepper, zambos and parsley.
Step 3: Mix everything well and little by little add the beaten eggs.
Step 4: Add the tuna and onion making sure everything is well mixed.
Step 5: Put a little flour in your hands and form pancakes of the size that you consider appropriate.
Step 6: Pass them in flour, covering them well and place them separately in a tray or “Pyrex” type mold.
Step 7: Heat plenty of oil in a pan, and when it is hot, reduce the temperature to medium heat and fry the pancakes side and side until golden brown.
